Reviews.Title: “FANTASTICO!”
Reviews.Author: kcaniglia
Reviews.Content: family loved hotel domus stayed week capo happier location ideal rome clean cozy provided ammenities prima breakfast perfect italian style nice lady cappuccinos morning lovely slept 3 cramped luggage fit below window sill slept soundly night street quiet

Reviews.Title: “Tiny room and noisy night”
Reviews.Author: togauk
Reviews.Content: hotel location heart trastevere eat drink evenings double stayed tiny barely bags bed bathroom im managed able squeeze shower cubicle move virtually sound proofing woke times night hearing people coming breakfast ok typically italian coffee pastries else offer staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “No swinging cats”
Reviews.Author: rgrbrns
Reviews.Content: single tiny wide stretch arms bed similar bit camp stretcher worst located reception sound proofing difficult sleep hearing movement greeting reception dont avoid ground floor dont excited breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Location Good, everything else not”
Reviews.Author: paulocarrilho
Reviews.Content: visiting rome stayed domus 3 nights calling hotel overstatement location excellent walking distance colosseum attractions quality leaves desired 1 double reservation arrived tried send hotel called hotel trastevere house explained stay friend domus hotel single windows basement refused stay demanded documents threaten leave lying trying capitalize sending guest worse hotel owned people 2 stayed door reception sound isolation idea hear receptionist night reading newspaper time entered hotel hear speaking managed sleep tired walking day curtains windows sunshine wake call 3 tv reconnect finally managed sad international channels lot 4 day left leave 0700 breakfast told 0800 provide juice coffee unfortunately night clerk lazy help sum hostel location close trastevere night live restaurants price charge real hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Domus Tiberina
HotelInfo.Address: Via in Piscinula, 37, 00153 Rome, Italy
